mapper.select:
SELECT wo.*, cl.id we_charge_log_id, cl.charge_money, cl.charge_telephone, cl.charge_type, wi.id we_item_id, wi.item_count, wi.item_name, wi.item_total, wm.id we_return_item_id, wm.return_item_count, wm.return_item_name, wm.return_item_total, wc.id we_return_customer_id, wc.money, wc.telephone FROM we_order_detail wo LEFT JOIN we_charge_log cl ON wo.shop_id = cl.shop_id LEFT JOIN we_item wi ON wo.shop_id = wi.shop_id LEFT JOIN we_return_customer wc ON wc.shop_id =wo.shop_id LEFT JOIN we_return_item wm on wo.shop_id = wm.shop_id WHERE wo.shop_id=#{shopId} AND
wo.create_time=#{createTime} AND cl.create_time=#{createTime} AND wi.create_time=#{createTime} AND wm.create_time=#{createTime} AND wc.create_time=#{createTime}
